text.section:
This section does not:
Apply to the improvement of harbors; or
Affect any act of the General Assembly relating to the construction of a wharf or to the rights of a riparian owner.

Ballast, ashes, filth, earth, oysters, or oyster shells may not be deposited from a vessel to a site:
In the Chesapeake Bay above Sandy Point;
In Herring Bay; or
Below the high water mark in a river, creek, or harbor in the State.
A person in command or having charge of a vessel that violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine of not less than $20 and not exceeding $150.
The Natural Resources Police Force shall enforce this section.
